channel.title: Cannot Add Bridges In Tor User Config
channel.description:
I cannot add bridges to my Tor User Config file.
When I do this, I always get errors and cannot connect to Tor. I am following the example in "Tor Examples." Has anyone gotten this to work?

item.title: Cannot Add Bridges In Tor User Config
item.dc:creator: torjunkie
item.description:
Check my pending changes to the bridges wiki entry here:

http://kkkkkkkkkk63ava6.onion/wiki/Bridges

To see if it helps. I’ve tried to make it very explicit for the user, since bridges questions are a weekly affair around here.

Read full topic
item.source: Cannot Add Bridges In Tor User Config

item.title: Cannot Add Bridges In Tor User Config
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

Sorry, could you perhaps clarify which Kind of error you get? Is it something regarding your Access or rights?

Have a nice day,

Ego
